name: China Mahler
description:
Welcome to our entry for Godot Wild Jam 44: China Mahler. Theme: fragile. So why not act like a bull in a china shop?

You play as the bull Mahler, with the goal of destroying all pots in the china shop. He leaves a trail of destruction with his skateboard. How fast can you clear the china shop?

Control using the arrow keys or WASD. There is a practice area in the main menu, from which you can also enter the china shop.

Wildcards: Level menu, the main menu is also a playable level.

If you use Safari, do note that the game uses WebGL 2.0, which is not yet supported there. The game will work just fine in Firefox, Chrome or Edge!

Let us know whether you can beat the game, and in which time! :D Can you do sub 30? Or even beat the game under 20 seconds!?

It might go without saying, but all of the content in this entry was made by us during the jam. We only used an existing sound track and effects. For the destruction of the pots we used the Godot destruction plugin. Amazing plugin, thanks for creating it Jummit!

We are Nico and Gertjan from Shoe Fisher Games. We are indie developers from the Netherlands who create a little game called WanderOut in our spare time.

If you like this game, let us know by rating it, commenting on it, or by following us on Twitter or Facebook. If we get lots of positive feedback we might continue to make this into a fully featured game. Created using the excellent Godot engine.
